sections.heading: 22-24-1.Repealed by SL 1998, ch 136, §1Section 22-24-1
sections.text: 1 - Public indecency--Misdemeanor.Section 22-24-1.2 - Indecent exposure--Misdemeanor or felony.Section 22-24-1.3 - Indecent exposure involving a child--Felony.Section 22-24-1.4 - Private indecent exposure--Misdemeanor.Section 22-24-2 - 22-24-2,
